content: KCC-WF Kwik Cast Connect cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance push to connect, cast-in-place anchor for concrete on wood formwork with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick push-to-connect technology offers ultimate productivity Nails above head prevent head pop-offs due to rebar hits Design profile reduces lost anchoring points due to accidental rebar hits Perforated foam protects inner threads from concrete intrusion Standing setting tool (KCM-WF-ST) available for productivity Applications Ideal for pre-assembled / pre-fabricated hanger assemblies Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Seismic loading | Yes | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | IBC compliance | IBC 2009, IBC 2012, IBC 2015, IBC 2018 | Material composition | Carbon steel, Zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2268102 - Kwik Cast Connect KCC-WF Â½ ORG-ORG - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCC-WF 1/2 Cast-in anchor assy - 3676226 - KCC-WF 1/2 1/2 PALLET+KCM-WF-ST - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x KCC-WF 1/2 Cast-in anchor assy -
